stimulusHtml:
The position of a particle moving in the xy-plane is given by the vector 〈 4 t 3 ,   y ( 2 t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EBE@ 〉, where y is a

twice-differentiable function of t. At time  t = 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39D8@ , what is the acceleration vector of the particle?
choicesHtml: 〈 3 ,   2 y ′ ′ ( 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@401B@ 〉

〈 6 ,   4 y ′ ′ ( 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4020@ 〉

〈 12 ,   2 y ′ ′ ( 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40D5@ 〉

〈 12 ,   4 y ′ ′ ( 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40D7@ 〉
